definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: We have comprehensive plans to achieve these goals.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經擬好了周詳的計劃，準備一一實現這些目標。

sentences.english: Do you mean that my proposal is not comprehensive?
sentences.chinese: 你的意思是我的建議書不夠周詳嗎？

sentences.english: Vast systems have been built to freeze spending and implement cuts.
sentences.chinese: 制定了周詳的計劃來凍結開支，實施裁員。

sentences.english: I felt a sense of relief that we were that the plan that the President has put together very patiently, very carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得有些兒鬆了一口氣，總統的計劃周詳謹慎。

sentences.english: Although the plan was thorough, it was not carried  through.
sentences.chinese: 儘管計劃很周詳，但是沒有得到貫徹。

sentences.english: This is one of the most ill-executed steps in the entire process of losing weight.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個最周詳的全過程實施步驟減肥。

sentences.english: Although the intend was thorough, it was not carried via.
sentences.chinese: 盡筦計劃很周詳，但是沒有得到貫徹。

definition: to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
readily following good advice (idiom); willing to accept other people's views
lit. to attend to one thing and lose sight of another (idiom)/fig. to be unable to manage two or more things at once/cannot pay attention to one thing without neglecting the other
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
to cross the sea by a trick (idiom)/to achieve one's aim by underhanded means
